heading: HB06620
0: AN ACT PROVIDING EMERGENCY FOOD SUBSIDY TO EVERY POOR FILIPINO FAMILY AFFECTED BY THE ENHANCED COMMUNITY QUARANTINE DUE TO COVID-19 PANDEMIC AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREOF
status: Pending with the Committee on DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE since 2020-05-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB06620
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING EMERGENCY FOOD SUBSIDY TO EVERY POOR FILIPINO FAMILY AFFECTED BY THE ENHANCED COMMUNITY QUARANTINE DUE TO COVID-19 PANDEMIC AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREOF
ABSTRACT : Aims to provide emergency food subsidy to the marginalized and poor communities affected by the ECQ in the entire Luzon which shall cover 100,000 households in the NCR in the amount of FIVE HUNDRED PESOS (P500.00) per day for a duration of 30 days to ease the impact of the COVID-19; also includes households in all provinces whose economic activities are greatly affected.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : LEGARDA, LOREN
DATE FILED : 2020-03-23
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Aragones (000 2020-06-04)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE ON 2020-05-04
